content:
# It seems that I am still encountering the same issue where the stone furnace cannot be placed because it is too far from my current position (0, 0).
# 

# I need to ensure that I am moving to a position that is within the allowed placement distance of 10 tiles from my current location.

# Instead of trying to place the furnace at (-10, 5), I will choose a position that is closer to my current coordinates. 

# I can move to a position like (-1, 1) or any nearby coordinate within the maximum distance.

move_to(Position(-1, 1))  # Move to a closer position where I can place the new stone furnace.
